event.title: Software Freedom Day 2019 in Shenzhen
event.description:
Celebrate Software Freedom Day!

Let's talk about free software.

Software Freedom Day (SFD) is an annual worldwide celebration of Free Software. https://www.softwarefreedomday.org/

SFD is a public education effort with the aim of increasing awareness of Free Software and its virtues, and encouraging its use.

in Shenzhen

Celebrate Software Free Day! Let's talk about free software.

Software Freedom Day (SFD) is a worldwide celebration of free software every year. https://www.softwarefreedomday.org/

SFD is a public education initiative designed to raise awareness and encourage the use of free software and its virtues.

In shenzhen

Presented by those who want to publish in UnConference format.

Anyone who wants to talk about Linux, oss, and open source hardware can speak every 10 minutes.

In addition, demonstrations and consultations can be made while eating snacks freely.

I brought a pizza oven from Japan. Let's talk while eating!

Date

2019 Sep 21 17:00-19:00

Place

Room 19,Huaqiang North International maker Center ,District A， Building B, Huaqiang Plaza, Huaqiang North Road, Huaqiang North Street, Futian District, Shenzhen, China

Cost

Free!

To register

Please come to the venue freely
event.address: 中国·深圳·福田区·华强北路1019号华强广场裙楼7楼
event.place: 華強北国際創客中心 HUA QIANG BEI INTERNATIONAL MAKER CENTER
